comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Harry Cody of Toronto, the international outdoor amateur skating champion.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Feb 10, 1916 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20616F83E5E13738... notes that he won the one-mile race at Saranac Lake, NY and the following day, Feb 11, 1916, the NYT reported him as champion of the overall event select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10E12FE345C1373...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton and swanq: Thanks for the further details on Cody. We will expand this record.
